question: In which among the following states of India, the parallel Government was running between 1942 to 1944 during the Quit India Movement?
explanation: The Tamralipta Jatiya Sarkar was an independent parallel government which was constituted during the Quit India Movement in Tamluk, West Bengal. It functioned from December 17, 1942 to August 8, 1944. The chief leaders were Satish Chandra Samanta, Sushil Kumar Dhara, Ajoy Mukherjee and Matangini Hazra.
